desc: This book constitutes thoroughly revised selected papers of the Second International Workshop on Conflict and Resolution in Decision Makrung, COREDEMA 2016, held in The Hague, The Netherlands, in August 2016. The 9 revised papers  presented were carefully reviewed and selected from 13 submissions.

title: Conflict Resolution in Decision Making: Second International Workshop, COREDEMA 2016, The Hague, The Netherlands, August 29-30, 2016, Revised Selected Papers (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
